title: Pose Machines: Articulated Pose Estimation via Inference Machines

author: Varun Ramakrishna, School of Computer Science, Carnegie Mellon University

segmentation: Hello everybody, I environment Krishna and I'll be talking about my work pose machines.
And the goal of this work is to estimate the articulated two repose of a person in a single image.
